description:
Choose your aircraft from a diverse fleet of high-tech aircraft and take to the skies to battle your opponents in fast-paced, intense racing.

Each aircraft has unique characteristics and capabilities, allowing you to choose the perfect aircraft for your play style. Whether you want to be fast and agile or prefer power and firepower, the choice is yours!

During the races, you will not only have to outrun your opponents, but also use various boosters and projectiles to gain an advantage. Collect boosters to get ahead, and arm yourself with rockets, machine guns and other weapons to neutralize your competitors.

The game offers many different tracks, each of which is full of dangerous turns, narrow passages and unexpected obstacles. Overcome them with skill and precision to reach the finish line first. This is a real air battle, where every maneuver and every decision can be decisive. Test your piloting skills, strategic thinking and reactions in this exciting game where only the best can rise to the top and become champions of the skies!
name: Sky Airplane Racer: Flight & Fight Simulator
